title: PT 4: She's Afraid The Man She's Dating Is Lying About His Finances
description:
For the last month, Tori has has been dating a guy she thought was great. But her views of him shifted after he asked her money. They haven't known each other long, and now she's suspicious.
She reached out to us seeking help doing a background check on this man. Is there something he's hiding about his finances? We have the answers.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
